solution_line_template: After the accident, Mike can only type {original_speed} words/minute - {speed_loss} words/minute = <<{original_speed}-{speed_loss}={reduced_speed}>>{reduced_speed} words/minute.
So, he will be able to finish typing the document in {document_length} words / {reduced_speed} words/minute = <<{document_length}/{reduced_speed}={minutes_needed}>>{minutes_needed} minutes.
